RLS/Role: Company owners can access own data | Admins view all
Repro (short): Login as supplier → Dashboard shows KPIs

RLS/Role: Suppliers manage own products | RLS on supplier_id
Order participants access payment data | RLS enabled
Repro (short): Create payment link → Copy URL → Mark paid

RLS/Role: Suppliers access assigned leads | Client owns leads
Repro (short): Filter leads → Update status → Assign to user

RLS/Role: Order participants (client/supplier) access | Admins view all
Repro (short): View order → Send message → Update status

RLS/Role: Quote participants access | Supplier creates quotes
Repro (short): Create quote → Add items → Send to client

RLS/Role: Company owners access own analytics | Secure functions
Repro (short): Select date range → View charts → Export data

RLS/Role: Users access own notifications | RLS on user_id
